items.title: Introduction to Basics of Lean Management
items.headline: Basic Awareness to lean management, its concepts,tools and techniques

This course will introduce you to lean tools that are needed to implement lean practices across your company
You will learn about the common 8 types of wastes that exist in every system. You will lean to identify them and eliminate them

items.title: Happy Hybrid Teams - Managing Remote & Onsite Employees
items.headline: How to build highly engaged and effective team if your employees are working from home and in the office.
objectives_summary: Over 30 practical solutions to 15 real life challenges of remote and hybrid team managers that can be applied at no cost immediately after the course
How to manage highly engaged and effective team no matter if your employees are working in the office or remotely
Why we behave the way we do when working remotely explained with psychology and management research findings
